name: Journal **A5**
description:
A leather bound A5 journal containing 130 pages of 80gsm blank white paper.

Each one is crafted from a 2mm thick wax-tanned bull hide which is supple yet tough and will develop a fantastic patina over time. This is the kind of leather you won’t mind getting scratched. 

The folios are bound to the leather with a dark brown waxed thread in a cross patter. Closure is provided via a strap running around the entire journal.

name: Card Pouch
description:
A cool little pouch to keep some cards and cash if you can't be bothered with carrying a wallet, it will accommodate around 4 plastic cards , some folded cash and several business cards.

Available in a various colours, each one is treated with an organic balm containing beeswax and natural oils to bring out the colour and grain. Each one is then hand stitched with a cross pattern using a waxed dark brown thread.

I can provide stamped lettering at no extra cross if you want to make one into a gift for somebody.

name: Harley Davidson Sportster Solo Seat Kit **Distressed Tan**
description:
Give your Harley Davidson Sportster the vintage bobber look with this complete bolt-on kit made in Manchester. Designed for late motel Sporties (2010+), the kit comprises of a completed bobber seat, front and rear brackets, a pair of 2" chrome barrel springs, a leather wiring cover with self-adhesive Velcro strips and all necessary nuts, bolts and washers.

                                             The Seat

    The completed seat measures approximately 13" long and 12" at the widest point (when looking straight down from above)
    I have my pans made by a local sheet metal company. Each one is constructed from 3mm thick steel, and has been formed and shaped by hand before being powder coated gloss black.
    I use a firm 20mm thick closed-cell polyethylene foam which will not absorb moisture. I do not use cheap upholstery grade foam as it has no place on motorcycle seats.
    The pan is covered in a high quality vegetable-tanned leather sourced from a long established British tannery. The entire underside is also covered in the same leather and held in place by 21 stainless steel rivets.
    The top is covered by wet moulding the leather around the foam, giving the seat a slim, barebones profile.
    The two layers of leather are stitched together by hand using the traditional English saddle stitch method which is very strong and long lasting. I use a waxed and braided polyester thread which has a very high tensile strength and is resistant to UV radiation, perfect for outdoor gear.
    All the leather is dyed and buffed. I sand, slick and coat all edges to give a finished look to the seat before treating the leather with an organic balm containing beeswax and natural oils to bring out the colour and provide protection from the elements.

                                       The Mounting Kit

    The mounting kit comprises of 32 individual pieces ( a pair of self-adhesive rubber feet for the rear bracket are not shown in the picture)
    Like the pan, the front and rear brackets are made from 3mm thick steel and are powder coated gloss black.
    All metal nuts, bolts and washers are stainless steel


The entire kit will come mostly assembled, all you will have to do is install the wiring cover and attach the whole lot to the bike.

PLEASE NOTE: Leather is a natural material, and as my products are hand made to order and not made in a factory, the colour will differ slightly from that seen in the pictures. Also, because I am using genuine full grain leather, the colour will change over time and with use. In all honesty, both these things mean your seat will be unlike anyone else's, which is what customising is all about in the first place!


If paying cash upon pickup, I will require a £50 deposit through Paypal or bank transfer before I start work on your seat.

name: Solo/Spinger Seat **Distressed Tan**chopper, bobber, custom, cruiser, Harley Davidson**
description:
Give your bike the vintage bobber look with this springer seat in a distressed tan, hand-made in Manchester (modeled on a 2012 Harley Davidson 48 in the photo).

    The completed seat measures approximately 13" long and 12" at the widest point (when looking straight down from above)
    It has four threaded M10 studs. The front two are positioned 2.5" & 5" from the nose of the seat. The rear two are positioned 10" from the nose and 8" apart
    I have my pans made by a local sheet metal company. Each one is constructed from 3mm thick steel, and has been formed and shaped by hand before being powder coated gloss black.
    I use a firm 20mm thick closed-cell polyethylene foam which will not absorb moisture. I do not use cheap upholstery grade foam as it has no place on motorcycle seats.
    The pan is covered in a high quality vegetable-tanned leather sourced from a long established British tannery. The entire underside is also covered in the same leather and held in place by 21 stainless steel rivets.
    The top is covered by wet moulding the leather around the foam, giving the seat a slim, barebones profile.
    The two layers of leather are stitched together by hand using the traditional English saddle stitch method which is very strong and long lasting. I use a waxed and braided polyester thread which has a very high tensile strength and is resistant to UV radiation, perfect for outdoor gear.
    All the leather is dyed and buffed. I sand, slick and coat all edges to give a finished look to the seat before treating the leather with an organic balm containing beeswax and natural oils to bring out the colour and provide protection from the elements.


PLEASE NOTE: Leather is a natural material, and as my products are hand made to order and not made in a factory, the colour will differ slightly from that seen in the pictures. Also, because I am using genuine full grain leather, the colour will change over time and with use. In all honesty, both these things mean your seat will be unlike anyone else's, which is what customising is all about in the first place!


If paying cash upon pickup, I will require a £50 deposit through Paypal or bank transfer before I start work on your seat.

name: Minimalist Wallet
description:
A simple wallet for guys who don't carry a ton of cards around with them. Two slits accommodate up to three cards each whilst notes are stored in the usual way. Each wallet is hand stitched in a tradition saddlery manner with a brown braided polyester thread that is extremely tough and durable.

These wallets are made in either a soft, wax-tanned leather or raw vegetable-tanned leather that I have treated with an organic beeswax and natural oil balm to bring out a mellow tone. Both leathers will develop a fantastic patina over time and with use.

name: Harley Davidson Softail/Rigid Solo Bag/Swingarm Bag
description:
Up for sale are brand new solo bags Harley Davidson Softails and custom rigids and hardtails. (Bag is modeled on a Harley Davidson Cross Bones in the picture)

Each of my bags are crafted from 3mm drum dyed-vegetable tanned leather and is completely hand-made to order by me in Manchester from start to finish using tradition saddlery tools and techniques. Unlike similar bags for sale, I do not use a machine to create a lock-stitch which can come undone along its length. For my bags, I use a 1mm thick braided and waxed polyester thread, and employ a "saddle stitch". As the name suggests, this manner of stitch is from the world of saddlery and is employed for its strength. Here, the stitch is made from a single length of thread with a needle on both ends. Both needles are passed through each hole, creating a stitch which can be described as a running figure of eight. This means that if the thread is torn on one side, the stitch will still hold, unlike a machined lock-stitch which can be pulled out. The saddle stitch can only be done by hand. 

Before each bag is constructed, I clean and polish the leather before conditioning it with a balm containing beeswax and natural oils.
Additionally, I take the time to sand, smooth, dye and wax all edges, giving a professional and complete look to the bag.

Dimensions are 11" width, 15" tall side, 8" short side, approx 5"deep and is made to be mounted on the left side. 

The top flap is secured by two straps passing through a pair of heavy duty chrome roller buckles. The bag itself is attached to the bike at three mounting points with buckled leather straps and option releasable wide cable ties (both included).

I can customise the bags according to thread colour, buckles and leather colour.  Furthermore, I can also make the bags from raw leather, giving you complete control of the colour and tolling/carving option. Please do not hesitate to contact me about pricing and options.

Unless otherwise stated with your order, the bag with black thread.

As the bags are made by hand it can take up to fifteen working days for yours to be ready.  I welcome local pickup with cash payment.

name: Dark Brown Tablet Case
description:
For sale is a slip case available for 7” and 10” tablets.
Each one is crafted from a 2mm thick wax-tanned bull hide which is supple yet tough and will develop a fantastic patina over time. This is the kind of leather you won’t mind getting scratched. 

Each one is laced with a strong, dark brown calf lace in a double whip pattern that complements the colour of the leather and provides a subtle detail to the case.

A 1” wide strap runs around the entire case to provide the enclosure with a heavy duty chrome roller buckle. 

Similar cases sold elsewhere have the straps riveted to the case, a design feature which runs the risk of scratching your tablet. With mine, I stitch the strap onto the case with a strong, waxed polyester thread. This takes more time, but is well worth it to protect your tablet in the long run.

If you have a tablet or e-reader that does not come under 7” & 10”, please do not hesitate to contact me for a custom order.

Case is shown with a Samsung Galaxy Tab II

name: Stitchless Coin Pouch
description:
A stitchless coin pouch available in a soft, wax-tanned leather or natural vegetable-tanned leather.

Measuring 11cm on each side, this is a handy little pouch to keep loose change in. 
It can be made from a dark brown wax-tanned leather that is supple but really tough, or a raw vegetable-tanned leather that I have treated with an organic beeswax and natural oil balm to bring out a mellow tone. Both leathers will develop a fantastic patina over time and with use.
There are no stitches as the pouch is held together by two heavy duty chrome snaps on either side.

name: Motorcycle Tool Bag
description:
For sale is a hand-crafted tool leather tool bag.

Each bag is crafted from 3mm thick drum dyed vegetable-tanned leather and is completely hand-made by me in Manchester from start to finish using tradition saddlery tools and techniques. Unlike similar bags for sale, I do not use a machine to create a lock-stitch which can come undone along its length. For my bags, I use a 1mm thick braided and waxed polyester thread, and employ a "saddle stitch". As the name suggests, this manner of stitch is from the world of saddlery and is employed for its strength. Here, the stitch is made from a single length of thread with a needle on both ends. Both needles are passed through each hole, creating a stitch which can be described as a running figure of eight. This means that if the thread is torn on one side, the stitch will still hold, unlike a machined lock-stitch which can be pulled out. The saddle stitch can only be done by hand. 

Before each bag is constructed, I clean and polish the leather before conditioning it with an organic balm containing beeswax and natural oils.
Additionally, I take the time to sand, smooth, dye and wax all edges, giving a professional and complete look to the bag. 

The bag measures w10.5" x h 5" x d 3.5". Two thick leather straps with roller buckles are included, with the mounting points being spaced 6" apart.

The top flap is secured by two 1" wide straps passing through a pair of heavy duty chrome roller buckles.

I can fully customise the bags according to thread colour, buckles and leather colour. Please do not hesitate to contact me about pricing and options. 

Free postage if bought as part of a matching set with the Harley Davidson Sportster Solobag.

As the bags are made by hand it can take up to fifteen working days for yours to be ready.

name: Plain Cuff 1.5"
description:
This plain cuff is made from 3mm thick high grade vegetable tanned leather. It measure 1.5” wide and is fitted with chrome snaps for fastening.
After being cut and hand scribed along the edges, the cuff has been dyed, polished and treated with an organic balm containing beeswax and natural oils to bring out lustre in the colour and texture of the leather. The edges have then been slicked and coated with a protective finish.

Available in tan or dark brown.

Send me a message with your wrist size and I will take care of the rest!

name: Red Concho Cuff
description:
This cuff measures 2” wide and tapers to 1”  on both ends with a chrome snap for fastening. 
Starting life as a 3mm thick high grade vegetable tanned leather, it has been scribed and decorated with a hand tooled border along the perimeter.
I have dyed it a deep red that subtly becomes darker towards the edges before being oiled and treated with an organic balm containing beeswax and natural oils to bring out lustre in the colour and ensure the leather becomes supple when broken in. Finally, the cuff has been adorned with a floral concho held in place by a turquoise stone rivet.

Send me a message with your wrist size and I will take care of the rest!

name: Brown Laced Cuff
description:
This cuff is inspired by New World era Spanish and Portuguese style leather work. It measures 2” wide and tapers to 1" on both ends with a chrome snap for fastening. 
Starting life as a 3mm thick high grade vegetable tanned leather, it has been scribed and decorated with a hand tooled border along the perimeter.
The cuff has then been dyed a rich medium brown before being oiled and treated with an organic balm containing beeswax and natural oils to bring out lustre in the colour and ensure the leather becomes supple when broken in. For decoration, I have laced the long edges with a soft, dark brown calf lace whilst applying the same lacing pattern down the centre of the cuff but in a flat manner.

Send me a message with your wrist size and I will take care of the rest!

name: Medium Brown Tooled Guitar Strap
description:
This 2" wide strap starts life as a piece of 3.5mm thick raw leather. I have hand tooled a two layer pattern along the edge and then dyed the strap a medium brown colour.
A square nickle buckle allows for some adjustment whilst a leather loop has been hand stitched underneath it.
The edges have been slicked, dyed and waxed to give a professional look and the entire strap has been oiled to increase flexibility and suppleness. 
Finally, two floral conchos decorate either end and are held in place by turquoise stone rivets, giving the strap an Old West look.

The strap comes as 50-54" long but I can make it to any custom length you want.

name: Celtic Cross Guitar Strap
description:
A black guitar strap made in the classic style with a 2 1/2" main body and 1 1/4" wide adjustment straps. I have made this strap from 4mm thick vegetable tanned leather that will look better with age and use. All edges have been slicked and dyed to give a professional, finished look. 

A simple, quality nickel buckle furnishes the adjustment strap whilst the main body is decorated with 1 1/2" wide celtic cross conchos. Additionally, I have rubbed the rivets with emery cloth to dull them so they match the antique silver look of the crosses.

The thickness and width is perfect for heavier guitars like Les Pauls, Flying Vs, Explorers and bigger guitars such as semi acoustics. The weight of the leather means the strap will not stretch over time. This is definately a solid bit of kit.

The strap can be adjusted from 46" to 54" and has 10mm holes to accommodate strap locks.

If you require a longer length, send me a message alongside you order.

name: Gold Concho Guitar Strap
description:
A chocolate brown guitar strap made in the classic style with a 2 1/2" main body and 1 1/4" wide adjustment straps. I have made this strap from 4mm thick vegetable tanned leather that will look better with age and use. All edges have been slicked and dyed to give a professional, finished look. 

A simple, quality brass buckle furnishes the adjustment strap whilst the main body is decorated with 1 1/2" wide gold coloured conchos stamped with a cool Aztec style design.

The thickness and width is perfect for heavier guitars like Les Pauls, Flying Vs, Explorers and bigger guitars such as semi acoustics. The weight of the leather means the strap will not stretch over time. This is definately a solid bit of kit.

The strap can be adjusted from 46" to 54" and has 10mm holes to accommodate strap locks.

If you require a longer length, send me a message alongside you order.

name: Classic Style Guitar Strap
description:
An elegant guitar strap made in the classic style. The main body is 2 1/2" wide, whilst the adjustment straps are 1 1/4" wide. I have made this strap from 4mm thick vegetable tanned leather that will look better with age and use. All edges have been slicked and dyed to give a professional, finished look. 

The thickness and width is perfect for heavier guitars like Les Pauls, Flying Vs, Explorers and bigger guitars such as semi acoustics.

A simple border frames the strap, whilst an understated satin nickle buckle and keeper provides the furnishing. 
The strap can be adjusted from 46" to 54" and is made to accommodate strap locks.

Also available in black and with a choice of nickel or brass hardware.

If you require a longer length, send me a message alongside you order.

name: Game of Thrones iPad sleeves
description:
I thought I'd have some fun and let my inner nerd out. Show your allegiance with these Game of Thrones iPad sleeves. Each one has a hand carved sigil for the major houses of Westeros, their motto pyrographed into the leather and hand dyed to match their banners.

Note: House Stark is brown because dyeing leather gray is not possible.

Like my other sleeves, they are made out of a single piece of 2mm thick cowhide and hand stitched with strong, waxed thread. 

Currently, I offer House Baratheon, House Stark and House Lannister but will be offering more in the near future.

Contact me if you would like a sleeve but for a different model and make of tablet.

name: Harley Davidson Sportster Solobag
description:
Up for sale are brand new solo bags for late model (2005+) Harley Davidson Sportsters, so it will fit Irons, Nightster, 48s and Seventy Twos.

Each bag is crafted from 3mm thick drum dyed vegetable-tanned leather and is completely hand-made by me in Manchester from start to finish using tradition saddlery tools and techniques. Unlike similar bags for sale, I do not use a machine to create a lock-stitch which can come undone along its length. For my bags, I use a 1mm thick braided and waxed polyester thread, and employ a "saddle stitch". As the name suggests, this manner of stitch is from the world of saddlery and is employed for its strength. Here, the stitch is made from a single length of thread with a needle on both ends. Both needles are passed through each hole, creating a stitch which can be described as a running figure of eight. This means that if the thread is torn on one side, the stitch will still hold, unlike a machined lock-stitch which can be pulled out. The saddle stitch can only be done by hand. 

Before each bag is constructed, I clean and polish the leather before conditioning it with a balm containing beeswax and natural oils.
Additionally, I take the time to sand, smooth, dye and wax all edges, giving a professional and complete look to the bag. 

Dimensions are 4" width, 13" base, 5" height short side, 10" height long side and 10.5" top and is made to be mounted on the left side. The dimensions are ideal for keeping a few essentials rather than carrying around a backpack just for your lock and gloves (I keep a 1.4m Oxford chain lock and a PacSafe helmet bag in there at all times). 

The top flap is secured by two straps passing through a pair of heavy duty chrome roller buckles. The bag itself is attached to the bike at three mounting points with buckled leather straps (included). 

Unlike with the official Harley Davidson bag, passenger pegs can still be installed, but the mounting bracket will need to be brought forward using longer than stock bolts. Please see the following link for more details: http://xlforum.net/vbportal/forums/showthread.php?t=496023&page=3 

I can fully customise the bags according to thread colour, buckles and leather colour. Please do not hesitate to contact me about pricing and options. 

I use this bag on my own 48, so I am fully aware of the level of quality we bikers require for our money. 

As the bags are made by hand it can take up to fifteen working days for yours to be ready. 

Free postage if bought as part of a matching set with the Harley Davidson Sportster Solobag.
